tags.name: dd-incrementer
tags.description: A number input that allows more flexible increase/decrease buttons

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The initial value to put in the input

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The form name to use when this input is used to submit data

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: The minimum value that this input can contain

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: The maximum value that this input can contain

attributes.name: smallStep
attributes.description: The value that the input is changed by when clicking a delta button or using the up/down arrow key

attributes.name: largeStep
attributes.description: The value that the input is changed by when clicking a delta button with control held or using the page up/ page down arrow key
